# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(str::AbstractString; text_width::Int=10)
    line = ""
    for word in split(str)
        if length(line) + length(word) > text_width
            line *= "\n"
        elseif !isempty(line)
            line *= " "
        end
        line *= word
    end
    return line
end
```
Examples:
```julia
wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines") # => "This\nfunction\nwill\nwrap\nwords\ninto\nlines"
wrap_string("This is a very long sentence that needs to be wrapped", text_width=15) # => "This is a very\nlong sentence\nthat needs\nto be wrapped"
```
